definitions.text: having existence or being or actuality
examples: an attempt to refine the existent machinery to make it more efficient
much of the beluga caviar existing in the world is found in the Soviet Union and Iran

definitions.text: being or occurring in fact or actuality; having verified existence; not illusory; ; ; ; ; ; - Longfellow
examples: a film based on real life
Life is real! Life is earnest!

definitions.text: presently existing in fact and not merely potential or possible
examples: the predicted temperature and the actual temperature were markedly different
